creator: quantum software solution
descriptionHtml: 1. Promise is a digital ledger app for small business owners and their customers to facilitate the recording of credit/payment transactions digitally all over India. 2. Promise equips merchants with an uncomplicated and secure means of administering credit and debit records for their business conducted on an account basis. 3. It digitises their transactions and documents payment, hence, diminishing the burden of maintaining paper account books aka Bahi Khata. 4. The ability to provide on-demand clarity of the merchant’s record to the shoppers is achievable for the first time.
descriptionShort: Promise is a ledger app for business to record Credit/Debit transactions.
title: Promise - A Digital Proof

creator: quantum software solution

title: Promise

creator: quantum software solution
descriptionHtml:
Promise Mobile App is one of the first ledger accounts in India where entry of lending money is done by the mutual consent of customer and the lender, so that the customer cannot deny at the time of paying the money.

1. Digital India’s – Digital Proof: Promise Mobile App gives a convenience to our verified customers to make a digital proof of payment. This digital proof of payment may result in unwanted consequences in future.

2. Proof of Honesty – Entry of lending money in Promise Mobile App is double verified so that there is no mistake while lending money to customers in future. This may save from dishonesty in future.

प्रोमिस डिजिटल इंडिया का पहले बही खाता है जिसमे उधार लेन देन की एंट्री ग्राहक एवं व्यापारी दोनो की सहमति से होती है। ताकि आपका ग्राहक चुकाने के टाइम पर बकाया राशि से मुकर न सके।

१. डिजिटल इंडिया का डिजिटल प्रूफ: प्रोमिस का वेरिफाइड खाता आपको उधार लेन देन को डिजिटल प्रूफ बनाने की सुविधा देता है जिससे आप भविष्य मैं उधार लेन देन की वजह से होने वाले वाद विवाद और मतभेदों से बच सकते हैं!

२. ईमानदारी का पक्का सबूत: प्रोमिस के वेरिफाइड खाते मैं उधार लेन देन की एंट्री डबल वेरिफाइड होती है जिससे भविष्य मैं उधार लेन देन के हिसाब मैं होने वाली भूल चूक और बेईमानी से बचा जा सकता है!
descriptionShort: A ledger app for recorded lending with mutual consent to avoid payment denial.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Digital Proof: A passbook of the last 10 transactions between users.
Promise Agreement: A feature that allows users to create a promise of paying back the loan with a specific date and penalty for non-payment.
Interest Agreement: Users can generate an agreement to charge a specific interest rate on the total loan amount.
10-Minute Functionality: In the verified section, users have 10 minutes to accept or reject a transaction, otherwise, it will time out.

descriptionShort: A ledger app for recorded lending with mutual consent to avoid payment denial.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The new Promise Comes up with Brand new features.
Now you can check the Honesty of the borrower as well as of lender also with help of Honesty Meter. this meter shows you honesty in 3 ways first in the form of honesty symbole second in the form of honesty parcentage and third one the age of the user on app.
Now you can share your transaction note on multiple plateforms.
the new category feature gives you an option to specified your transactions according to your related transaction category.
